comments.author: Jinx9975
comments.body: Here are my top 10 all-time favorite TV series:1. Breaking Bad - Stellar acting, writing, character development, and storytelling. Bryan Cranston is genius as the protagonist morphing into a ruthless drug kingpin.2. Game of Thrones - Epic fantasy brought vividly to life with phenomenal production values and an expansive world full of fascinating characters. The scope is simply monumental.3. The Wire - Regarded by many critics as the greatest TV drama ever. It's a gripping, super realistic portrayal of cities and people trapped in the drug war.4. Mad Men - Great period drama with gorgeous aesthetics. Fantastic acting and subtle writing that unpack society and human dynamics. 5. The Sopranos - Revolutionized TV. James Gandolfini shines in what became the template for prestige drama about deeply conflicted protagonists.6. Seinfeld - One of the most iconic comedies, it invented stories about ordinary life and molded sitcoms forever after. Completely hilarious.7. Avatar: The Last Airbender - Don't mistake the animation for kid material only. This show has incredible worldbuilding, character growth, and a phenomenal redemption story arc. 8. Black Mirror - Each episode is a thought-provoking, cynically speculative take on modern tech and where it might lead us. Very binge-worthy.9. Planet Earth - Perhaps the greatest nature documentary ever produced. It's visual art showcasing majestic shots of animals and environmental treasures.10. Cosmos - Carl Sagan's exploration of science and history is wondrous and perspective altering. It seeds a profound appreciation of nature's truths.
